casebody.data:
Wednesday, December 11, 1996

MOTION DOCKET

96-2656. Castle Nursing Homes, Inc. v. Sullivan.

Holmes App. No. 95CA541. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of judgment of the Holmes County Court of Appeals’ opinion and judgment entry filed November 21,1996,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, granted through the pendency of the appeal to this court.

Moyer, C.J., and Stratton, J., dissent.
